name: teleport
example_code: local target_tile	-- The tile you want to move to
example_comment: The above snippet causes the <%=class_name%> to teleport to.
description: Attempts to queue up a movement comand for the <%=class_name%> to teleport to a specified tile.
Returns `true` if the movement was possible *at the time it was called*, otherwise returns `false`.

parameters.name: target_tile
parameters.desc: The <%=tile%> the <%=class_name%> will be trying to move towards.

parameters.name: action_order
parameters.desc: The priority this action will have vs other movement actions.

parameters.name: on_begin
parameters.desc: A function to trigger if/when the movement action starts.
